articles.title: Nursing homes are a top priority for Covid vaccines. But vaccinating everyone won't be simple. - NBC News
articles.description: Nursing home residents and staff members will be among the first people in the U.S. to receive the coronavirus vaccine. But there are significant challenges to overcome before the vaccine is broadly administered to this high-risk population.
